alert.note: Alert for Brown; McCulloch; San Saba (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brown, eastern McCulloch and western San Saba Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 800 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Elm Grove, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Richland Springs, Algerita, Sloan, Elm Grove, Winchell, Brookesmith, Rochelle, Skeeterville, Placid, Mercury, Hall, Locker, Harkeyville, Milburn, Spring Creek, Us-190 Near The Mcculloch- San Saba County Line and Indian Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
